Did you know Riot Games mobile titles LoL: Wild Rift, TFT, and LoR pull in lifetime rev of $168M with 109M downloads?  Riot's been improving its monetization (rev per download) by a lotttt over the past 2 years from $0.07 in 2020 to $1.50 in 2022.
